layoutSubtitle: Manage shortcuts, appearance preferences, credentials, and local storage policies in one place.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Configure theme, UI text size, and language preference so DashPlayer fits your workflow.
appearance.themeDescription: Pick the visual style you prefer. The selected theme is applied immediately.
appearance.fontSizeDescription: Adjust interface text size to balance reading comfort and information density.
appearance.languageDescription: Follow your system language by default, or lock to Chinese/English for stable terminology.

checkUpdate.title: Version Updates
checkUpdate.failedDescription: Unable to fetch release data right now. Please try again later.
checkUpdate.latestTitle: You are on the latest version. Here is a tip.

tips.transcriptionBackground: While transcription is running, you can leave this page and keep watching videos. The transcript updates automatically when processing finishes.

shortcut.title: Shortcuts
shortcut.description: Use commas to separate multiple shortcuts.
shortcut.dialogDescription: Focus the input below, then press the shortcut you want to add.

previousSentence.title: Previous subtitle
previousSentence.description: Jump to the previous subtitle line.

nextSentence.title: Next subtitle
nextSentence.description: Jump to the next subtitle line.

playPause.title: Play or pause
playPause.description: Toggle playback between play and pause.

autoPause.title: Auto pause
autoPause.description: Pause automatically after each subtitle line.

toggleEnglishDisplay.title: Toggle English subtitle
toggleEnglishDisplay.description: Show or hide the English subtitle layer.

toggleChineseDisplay.title: Toggle Chinese subtitle
toggleChineseDisplay.description: Show or hide the Chinese subtitle layer.

toggleBilingualDisplay.title: Toggle bilingual subtitle
toggleBilingualDisplay.description: Switch bilingual subtitle display on or off.

toggleWordLevelDisplay.title: Toggle word-level subtitle
toggleWordLevelDisplay.description: Switch word-level subtitle display on or off.

nextPlaybackRate.title: Cycle playback speed
nextPlaybackRate.description: Switch among your preset playback speeds.

addClip.title: Add favorite clip
addClip.description: Save the current subtitle segment to favorites.

storage.title: Storage
storage.descriptionLine1: DashPlayer caches translation results to reduce API usage costs.
storage.descriptionLine2: Cache files are managed by the database layer. Please do not edit them manually.
storage.libraryPathDescription: After changing storage path, fully quit DashPlayer and relaunch it.
storage.saveSettingsFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again later: {{message}}
storage.syncWordClipsFailed: Failed to sync word-learning clips. Please try again later.

collectionSync.tooltipDescription: Rebuild the Saved Moments index from local files when items look missing or inconsistent.

storage.collectionHint: Saved Moments are fixed to favourite_clips/default. Switching collection names is no longer supported.

wordClipsSync.error: Failed to sync Vocabulary Studio clips.
wordClipsSync.tooltipDescription: Rebuild Vocabulary Studio clip records from the word_video folder when data is missing or abnormal.

storage.wordClipsHint: Vocabulary Studio clips are stored under word_video. Use this action to rebuild database records when needed.

tenant.description: Configure translation engines and related credentials.

tenant.tencentHintPrefix: Tencent credentials are required for subtitle translation. See
tenant.openaiHintLine1: OpenAI translation uses the key and endpoint configured in Service Credentials.
tenant.openaiHintLine2: Make sure your OpenAI configuration is complete and valid first.

engineSelection.title: Feature Controls
engineSelection.description: Choose a provider per feature and disable features independently.
engineSelection.intro: Each feature can use a different provider. If you choose "Disabled", that feature is skipped in the player.

subtitleTranslation.title: Subtitle Translation
subtitleTranslation.description: Control which provider powers subtitle translation.
subtitleTranslation.hiddenHint: OpenAI subtitle translation is currently not selected, so style options are hidden.

dictionary.title: Dictionary Lookup
dictionary.description: Used for word definitions and example lookups.

transcription.description: Control which provider handles speech transcription.

sentenceLearning.title: Sentence Learning
sentenceLearning.description: Enhances sentence parsing and learning guidance features.

serviceCredentials.title: Service Credentials
serviceCredentials.description: Manage cloud API credentials and local model assets.
serviceCredentials.intro: Credentials only control connectivity. Toggle feature behavior in the Feature Controls page.

openai.description: Used for subtitle translation, dictionary lookup, and cloud transcription.
openai.modelsHint: Supports newline or comma separators. Feature Controls uses this list for model selection per feature.

whisper.title: Local Whisper Models
whisper.description: Manage local transcription and silence-detection model assets.
